data.title: Stradun CLASSIC
data.meta_description: Stradun CLASSIC Classical music 04.-11.10.2019. Renowned Croatian clarinetist Marija Pavlovic is a 2018 'Artist in Residence' at the Dubrovnik Symphony Orchestr...
data.text:
Classical music

04.-11.10.2019.

Renowned Croatian clarinetist Marija Pavlovic is a 2018 'Artist in Residence' at the Dubrovnik Symphony Orchestra, along with the Dubrovnik Symphony Orchestra and top musicians from around the world & nbsp; is launching a new 'Stradun Classic' festival in 2018.

It is a premier chamber music festival, bringing together successful musicians from around the world. So in the first year, the festival featured oboist Tom Owen, bassoonist Pieter Nuytten, hornist Bostjan Lipovsek, violinist Daniel Rowland, cellist Monika Leskovar and Maja Bogdanovic, double bass player Zoran Markovic and pianist Martina Filjak.

In 2019, at the 'Stradun Classic' festival 'will feature world-class names such as mezzo-soprano Renata Pokupic, violinist Vineta Sareika, violinist Daniel Rowland, cellist Monica Leskovar, pianist Martina Filjak, hornist Radovan Vlatkovic and Boštjan Lipovsek, oboist Tom Owen, bassoonist Pietorrabell Daryreatti and conductor of the Dubrovnik Symphony Orchestra Marc Tardue.

The Duke's Palace at 9pm

Darrell Ang, conductor (Singapore)
